definition: Mutianyu, well-preserved section of the Great Wall 70km from Beijing

sentences.english: I took this photo browsing through an artist village near the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China.
sentences.chinese: 我在靠近中国长城的慕田峪段我拍摄了这张照片。

sentences.english: Tourists hike along the Great Wall of China in Mutianyu, north of Beijing on Jan. 12.
sentences.chinese: 1月12号，游客徒步在北京北面的慕田峪长城上。

sentences.english: Located at San Du He in HuaiRou county, about 72 kms from down town Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 慕田峪长城位于怀柔县三度河乡，距市区72公里。

sentences.english: After that, drive to the Cloisonne restaurant nearby the Mutianyu Great Wall and having typical Chinese lunch (50 minutes).
sentences.chinese: 之后开车前往慕田峪山脚下的景泰蓝餐厅享用午餐。

sentences.english: A visitor walks on the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall, on the outskirts of Beijing. (January 12, 2011) (Andy Wong/Associated Press)
sentences.chinese: 一名游客行走在慕田峪长城上。

sentences.english: This Mutianyu section of China’s Great wall, built in the 6th century, is located about 50 miles northeast of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 离北京50英里远的慕田峪长城修筑于六世纪。

sentences.english: You make a full day to the Great Wall Mutianyu section, a less visited section of the Wall.
sentences.chinese: 你花了一天的时间去长城参观，少慕田峪长段长城。

definition: Badaling, a particular section of the Great Wall that is a favorite tourist destination
Juyongguan, frontier fortress on Great Wall north of Beijing, in Changping district 昌平區|昌平区[Chang1 ping2 qu1]
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
Miyun town and county in Beijing
former Huairou county, now Huairou rural district of Beijing
Huairou rural district of Beijing municipality, formerly Huairou county
Pinggu rural district of Beijing, formerly Pinggu county
the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)
